column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It is hard to find parking
column2: and there will definitely be a line. Line isn't super fast
column3: but it isn't terribly slow either. Basically you look at the menu while you are in line
column4: so by the time you get up to the counter
column5: you know what you want. Also there is a glass display of baked goodies and sweets that you pass by on your way to the counter
column6: so you can pick out what you want.
